node.display_long_description:
How work should be.

Spatial brings people together for hangouts, immersive presentations, team planning, product reviews, & brainstorms.

During a time when collaboration feels disconnected, unclear, and inefficient, Spatial enables you to - 

SIT NEXT TO EACH OTHER FROM ACROSS THE WORLD
- Create your lifelike 3D avatar from a selfie in seconds
- Your avatar talks, moves, and interacts, mirroring in-person collaborative sessions

MAKE YOUR ROOM YOUR MONITOR & YOUR HANDS YOUR MOUSE
- Fill your room with information, defying the limits of your 2D screen
- Enjoy beautiful immersive 3D environments & Upload your own custom environments 
- Express and share ideas w/ whiteboarding, notes, & photo/3D model search 

USE ALL YOUR FAVORITE TOOLS
- Use our web app or Spatial Cast to bring in your desktop 
- Host Abilities
- Upload many 2D/3D file types 
- Integrate with Slack, Google Drive, & more

JOIN FROM ANY DEVICE
- VR + AR (Quest, Nreal, HoloLens, Magic Leap)
- Mobile (iOS + Android) & Web

nodes.title: Spatial 3.0! Custom Environments, Live Translation, Spatial Cast & More!
nodes.body_text:
üåêCustom Environments üë∑

Make your Spatial meeting take place wherever your heart desires! You can now upload totally customized environments to use as your meeting room! Bring in your files and go where your imagination takes you.



üó£Ô∏èLive Translation (Requires Pro  ‚öíÔ∏è Visit Spatial.io to Upgrade)

The days of language barriers are over! Pro users will be able to turn on Speech Captions in their settings set to accommodate 30+ languages. You can speak several languages in the same room! Live Translation requires all users in the meeting to be on Pro.



üë©‚ÄçüíªVirtual Monitor! Spatial Cast from Mac

Work alone with a GIANT monitor or share your screen to other with super low latency. High-performance app for streaming your desktop on macOS, complete with audio, into VR headsets.



üëÄJoin on web with no account

Your guests no longer need to make Spatial accounts to join via our web app Spectator. That's Right! Let it sink in, no-auth joining is here!



üîíPrivate Rooms Setting
Finally some privacy even from your Teammates - make it so that only users directly invited are able to see your room!



üèïÔ∏èNEW Environment: Outdoors!
Enjoy the beauty of the outdoors! Connect and sing songs around the campfire in our most unique environment yet!



üì∏Share Selfie Pictures 
Send your Spatial selfies and images directly to yourself or to everyone in the meeting via email.



üßçAvatar Improvements 
Choose your shirt color and modify your skin tone to look just right for you!



üóÑÔ∏è Support for importing OBJ, TIFF, & DAE files



üë®üèª‚Äçü§ù‚Äçüë®üèΩ Launch Party & Founder Keynote - Friday April 2nd

Go RSVP to the event!

node.reviewDescription: This app was a joy at first. Since going into lockdown, our studio has not had the possibility to meet our professors for in-person teaching, until some of us started using spatial. Now we can show, move, and look at our designs again in 3D "in person" - which is amazing now that all physical models are out of the question. However I am having massive troubles with importing a large amount of files into the rooms. Once I reach a certain numbers of 3D objects, the whole room starts moving after my head movement and there's no stopping it. I have to quit the whole app in order no to get completely sea sick. I currently have a room I can't enter due to it being  completely glitched. If these issues could be fixed I would give 5 of 5 stars. Cus the collaboration aspect is brilliant.

website_page_meta.description:
Spatial brings people together for hangouts, immersive presentations, team planning, product reviews, & brainstorms.

Spatial enables you to:

- Upload your own Custom Environments
- Sit next to each other from across the world by creating a lifelike avatar from a selfie in seconds
- Fill your room with  2D/3D content, including screen share, browser, sticky notes and whiteboarding
- Integrate with tools like Slack or Google
- Join from VR, AR, Web, & Mobile
